text:
James Woods Stands By Offensive Tweet as Mother Rushes to Her 10-Year-Old's Defense



James Woods isn’t backing down, but neither is the mother of the child he aimed a controversial tweet at.

After Neil Patrick Harris went to bat for a “gender creative”…

Source: James Woods Stands By Offensive Tweet as Mother Rushes to Her 10-Year-Old's Defense
